# Useful Resources

This is an ongoing list of things I have found useful and you may find useful too!

## Tools

* [DBeaver](https://dbeaver.io/) - just a great SQL client that supports a lot of databases
* [DB Fiddle](https://www.db-fiddle.com/) - an online sandbox to run your SQL queries
* [SQLime](https://sqlime.org/) - another online sandbox to write queries
* [DuckDB Local UI](https://duckdb.org/2025/03/12/duckdb-ui) - haven't tested it yet but looks neat so far

## Learning Resources

* [Advanced SQL Puzzles](https://github.com/smpetersgithub/AdvancedSQLPuzzles)
* [Use the Index, Luke](https://use-the-index-luke.com/)
